description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger A creature touches you, such as by Grappling you, successfully hitting you with an unarmed attack, or using a touch-range spell against you.

You exude a deadly toxin. The triggering creature takes [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 poison damage} (basic Fortitude save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4.

[[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d4 #poison]]{Levelled} poison damage

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
